description: DIY Diamond Art Kits——The fashionable handmade art of the moment!

Each diamond painting toolkit contains a set of tools for making drawings, so there is no need to purchase any other toolkits.  Each diamond has 20 facets, which can make the diamond painting look more three-dimensional and shiny. Diamond paintings feel more vivid and sparkle in the light, Waterproof canvas and non-fading drills make the finished project to keep for more than 20 years.  We add 30% of diamonds in each package to ensure that there are enough diamonds to complete the diamond painting.  The diamond painting canvas symbol is clear and easy to read, the pattern itself has a sticky background, the protective film will keep the picture sticky, even the elderly or children can easily finish it.  Diamond painting kit is the most popular decoration, it can also be used as a gift, such as birthday, Christmas, Thanksgiving, party, wedding, etc.  5D diamond painting kit is production process is very simple, can be completed in a shorter time, and it is easy to realize classic artwork. Experience the feeling of being a painter.  Just hang it on the wall to make your room and world more beautiful.  Diamond painting can also be used as a tool for mood relief and entertainment. When you focus on making diamonds, your heart will gradually become calmer.

Open the box and check the special tools for diamond painting.  Please refer to the numbers below the canvas to find the corresponding diamond.  Apply an appropriate amount of clay on the pen, and then paste the diamond on the corresponding canvas.  Press the diamond with a book or hand to make sure it is firm.

In the case of reducing the viscosity, do not expose too much unfinished canvas area.  Diamonds are not edible, please do not let children play to avoid accidents such as swallowing.  The product does not contain a frame. It is just a canvas.
